comment._content: Dr. Benjamin Franklin Roller (1876 - April 19, 1933), Physician and professional wrestler. According to this biographical sketch, he was married to Tracy Helen between 1910 and 1929. www.legacyofwrestling.com/RollerBio.html See also: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Roller

comment._content: Thanks, artolog, we'll update the record.
